requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:

  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 Gen 4 / AMD Proccesor 2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 / AMD Radeon R9 270 / 2 GB VRAM ANY
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1650 / AMD Radeon RX 550 / 3 GB VRAM ANY
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
